text: The following is a list of episodes for the American television sitcom, One Day at a Time. The series premiered on December 16, 1975 on CBS, and ended on May 28, 1984. A total of 209 episodes were produced spanning nine seasons. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (1975–76)=== ===Season 2 (1976–77)=== ===Season 3 (1977–78)=== ===Season 4 (1978–79)=== ===Season 5 (1979–80)=== ===Season 6 (1980–81)=== ===Season 7 (1981–82)=== ===Season 8 (1982–83)=== ===Season 9 (1983–84)=== ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Lists of American sitcom episodes
title: List of One Day at a Time (1975 TV series) episodes
